SEARCH
Package org.myshelfie.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
org.myshelfie.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Class representing a Game. This is the main class and is considered the model.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      Empty constructor used to subscribe to the event manager before the game is actually set up.

  • Method Details

    • setupGame

      public void setupGame(List<Player> players, Board board, HashMap<CommonGoalCard,List<ScoringToken>> commonGoals, TileBag tileBag, ModelState modelState, String gameName)
      Setup method used to initialize the game after its creation.
      Parameters:
      players - The list of players that will play the game
      board - The board of the game
      commonGoals - The map associating all the common goal cards to the corresponding stack of scoring tokens
      tileBag - The tile bag of the game
      modelState - The state of the game
      gameName - The name of the game, used in LobbyController to distinguish different games and to send the correct messages to the correct game.

    • getCurrPlayer

      public Player getCurrPlayer()
      Returns:
      The player that is currently playing

    • getPlayers

      public List<Player> getPlayers()
      Returns:
      The list of all the players in the game

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard()
      Returns:
      The board of the game

    • getCommonGoals

      public List<CommonGoalCard> getCommonGoals()
      Returns:
      The list of all the common goal cards in the game

    • getCommonGoalsMap

      public HashMap<CommonGoalCard,List<ScoringToken>> getCommonGoalsMap()
      Returns:
      The map associating every common goal card to the corresponding stack of scoring tokens

    • getTileBag

      public TileBag getTileBag()
      Returns:
      The tile bag of this game

    • getNextPlayer

      public Player getNextPlayer()
      Returns:
      The Player which will play next to currPlayer

    • getErrorState

      public String getErrorState(String nickname)
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player to search
      Returns:
      The error string associated to the player with the given nickname

    • setErrorState

      public void setErrorState(String nickname, String errorMessage)
      Set the error state for a player and notify the server adding the error message
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player
      errorMessage - The error message that will be incapsulated in the message

    • resetErrorState

      public void resetErrorState()
      Reset the error state of all the players. Send the notification only if at least one error state has been reset

    • popTopScoringToken

      public ScoringToken popTopScoringToken(CommonGoalCard c) throws WrongArgumentException
      Removes the top scoring token from the chosen common goal card and returns it.
      Parameters:
      c - The common goal card from which the token will be removed
      Returns:
      The removed scoring token
      Throws:
      WrongArgumentException - If the common goal card is not found

    • getTopScoringToken

      public ScoringToken getTopScoringToken(CommonGoalCard c) throws WrongArgumentException
      Returns the top scoring token from the chosen common goal card, without removing it.
      Parameters:
      c - The common goal card from which the token will be removed
      Returns:
      The top scoring token
      Throws:
      WrongArgumentException - If the common goal card is not found

    • setCurrPlayer

      public void setCurrPlayer(Player currPlayer) throws WrongArgumentException
      Set the given player to be the current player and notifies an update.
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - The player that will be set as the current one.
      Throws:
      WrongArgumentException - It the player is not found.

    • getModelState

      public ModelState getModelState()
      Returns:
      The current state of this game.

    • setModelState

      public void setModelState(ModelState modelState)
      Set the current state of this game. Notifies a GAME_END update if the state is END_GAME.
      Parameters:
      modelState - The state to be set.

    • saveState

      public void saveState()
      Save the current state of the game, to be resumed after a pause due to too many disconnections.

    • resumeStateAfterPause

      public void resumeStateAfterPause()
      Resume the state of the game after some player reconnects.

    • setWinner

      public void setWinner(Player winner) throws WrongArgumentException
      Set the winner of the game.
      Parameters:
      winner - The player that won the game.
      Throws:
      WrongArgumentException - If the player is not found.

    • getNumOnlinePlayers

      public int getNumOnlinePlayers()
      Returns:
      The number of online players

    • getGameName

      public String getGameName()
      Returns:
      The name of this game.

    • isPlaying

      public boolean isPlaying()
      Returns:
      True if the game is playing, false otherwise.

    • getNextOnlinePlayer

      public Player getNextOnlinePlayer()
      Get the next player that is online. If there are no online players, return null
      Returns:
      The next online player, or null if there are no online players
